title: UX Researcher
description:
UXTrend Studio is Hiring a UX Researcher (Full-Time)

UXTrend Studio, an Auckland-based design firm, creates user-focused experiences for clients in tech and education. We’re seeking an UX Researcher to inform our design decisions.

Role Summary
You’ll conduct research to shape UX strategies.

Key Duties
- Conduct user interviews.
- Analyze user behavior.
- Create personas.
- Perform usability testing.
- Present research findings.
- Develop journey maps.
- Stay updated on UX trends.
- Collaborate with designers.
- Support client meetings.
- Share team insights.

Qualifications
We need candidates with 2–3 years of experience in UX research, proficient in research tools. Strong analytical and communication skills are essential, along with usability testing experience. A Bachelor’s degree in HCI or a related field is required.

Why UXTrend?
We value user-centric design. Our hybrid work model and training support growth in a collaborative environment.

Perks
Health insurance
KiwiSaver
20 days of annual leave
Training budget
Research tools access
Team events

Apply Now
Join UXTrend Studio to shape user experiences. Submit your application today!
